snerun – main programmer¶

These classes provide various functions for snelist and snobject classes.

snelist¶

snelist([ax])

snelist: define a list of snobject, handle their data and fittings, aimed for a population study

snelist.__init__(self[, ax])

initialize snelist

snelist.read_kwargs(self, \*\*kwargs)

Define a proper way to read and update optional parameters

snelist.parse_meta(self[, withnew, source, …])

Read a meta table from local

snelist.parse_meta_one(self, idkey, objid, key)

Obtain value with object ID and a meta key

snelist.parse_meta_all(self, kwargs, objid)

properly read a list of meta infomations from self.meta, i.e.

snelist.parse_params(self[, force, parfile])

Besides the general parameter settings, for SNe with peculiar properties, a specific parameter is sometimes needed, and parse_params can read a text file (individual_par.txt) that includes all special settings for particular SNe.

snelist.load_data(self, objid[, force, datafile])

for each object, load their snobject classes if they’re cached before.

snelist.save_data(self, objid[, force, datafile])

for each object, save their snobject classes to local cached files.

snelist.run(self[, ax, ax1, ax2, ax3, ax4, …])

get a list of SNe, for each SN, define a dedicated snobject, and run snobject.run() for all of them.

snelist.add_subset(self[, syntax])

create a data subset from self.meta

snelist.table(self[, syntax, keys, tablename])

create a latex table for a subset of SNe

snelist.get_par(self, objid, parname[, …])

get parameter of one SN

snelist.format_par(v, vlow, vup[, digits])

make parameter into latex format

snelist.show1d(self, k[, nbin, fontsize, …])

1D histograms plot for one parameter

snelist.show2d(self, k1, k2[, fontsize, …])

2D scatter plot for two parameter

snelist.init_hist_axes(self[, pad, …])

create 2 subplots as histograms for the scatter plots

snelist.add_hist(self, x, y[, syntax, …])

make histograms

snobject¶

snobject(objid[, aliasid, z, ra, dec, …])

snobject: define snobject for one SN, handle its data and fittings.

snobject.__init__(self, objid[, aliasid, z, …])

initialize snelist

snobject.read_kwargs(self, \*\*kwargs)

Define a proper way to read and update optional parameters

snobject.run(self, \*\*kwargs)

actions for one SN.

snobject.config_ztfquery(self)

check and set ztfquery accounts

snobject.parse_coo(self[, verbose, deg, …])

handle SN coordinate from self.ra and self.dec

snobject.mjd_now(self[, jd])

get current juliand date via astropy.time

snobject.add_lc(self, df[, source])

add lightcurve data into self.lc

snobject.add_flux(self[, zp, source])

add flux and eflux column, based on mag, emag, and/or limmag column.

snobject.add_mag(self[, zp, source])

add mag and/or limmag/emag column, based on flux, eflux column.

snobject.get_external_phot(self, filename, …)

parse user defined photometric data to self.lc

snobject.bin_fp_atlas(self[, binDays, …])

binning for ATLAS forced photometry with Dave’s code, https://gist.github.com/thespacedoctor/86777fa5a9567b7939e8d84fd8cf6a76

snobject.get_fp_atlas(self[, binDays, clobber])

parse local ATLAS forced (binned or not binned) photometric data to self.lc

snobject.get_alert_ztf(self[, source])

parse local ZTF alert photometic data to self.lc

snobject.get_fp_ztf(self[, seeing_cut])

parse local ZTF forced photometic data to self.lc

snobject.query_fp_atlas(self, \*\*kwargs)

qeury ATLAS forced photometry, see https://fallingstar-data.com/forcedphot/static/apiexample.py

snobject.query_fp_ztf(self[, get_email])

qeury ZTF forced photometry, see documentation: https://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/ZTF/docs/forcedphot.pdf.

snobject.query_alert_ztf(self[, source])

qeury ZTF laert photometry via ztfquery, see https://github.com/MickaelRigault/ztfquery Note: this is only available for ZTF internal collaborators.

snobject.query_spectra(self[, source])

qeury ZTF spectra via ztfquery, see https://github.com/MickaelRigault/ztfquery Note: this is only available for ZTF internal collaborators.

snobject.get_local_spectra(self[, source])

get local ZTF fritz/marshal spectra Note: this is only available for ZTF internal collaborators.

snobject.correct_baseline(self, baseline[, …])

Baseline correction for ZTF forced photometry

snobject.calibrate_baseline(self[, ax, key, …])

Baseline calibration for ZTF forced photometry

snobject.get_external_spectra(self, …[, tel])

parse spectra via a local file

snobject.rapid(self[, ax])

run astrorapid codes (a Deep learning classifier to distiinguish LCs between different SNe type) on self.lc Note: this is only available when astrorapid packagte is correcly installed

snobject.rapid_plot(self, ax, class_names, …)

(static) make astrorapid plot

snobject.run_gp(self[, source])

run Gaussian Process interpolation via george package on self.lc

snobject.run_fit(self, enginetype[, source])

run model fittings on varies of data from different engines

snobject.set_peak_gp(self, filt)

set peak time and fluxes with GP interpolation

snobject.set_peak_bol_main(self[, …])

set peak time and fluxes with bolometric LC fittings

snobject.set_peak_multiband_main(self, filt)

set peak time and fluxes with multiband LC fittings

snobject.set_texp_pl(self, filt[, model_name])

set the explosion epoch with multiband LC fittings

snobject.set_texp_bol_main(self[, …])

set the explosion epoch with bolometric LC fittings

snobject.set_texp_midway(self)

set the explosion epoch with the first detection and the last non-detection

snobject._flux_at(self, filt, phase[, …])

estimate flux (unit in uJy)

snobject._flux_at_list(self, filt, phaselist)

estimate fluxes (unit in uJy) for a list of phases

snobject._mag_at(self, filt, phase[, …])

estimate apparent magnitude

snobject._mag_at_list(self, filt, phaselist)

estimate apparent magnitudes from a list of phases

snobject._absmag_at(self, filt, phase[, …])

estimate absolute magnitude

snobject._absmag_at_list(self, filt, phaselist)

estimate absolute magnitudes from a list of phases

snobject._color_at(self, filt1, filt2, phase)

estimate colour

snobject._rate_at(self, filt, phase1, phase2)

estimate magnitude rate

snobject.est_hostebv_with_c10(self[, …])

estimate host ebv with color comparison approach

snobject.calc_colors(self, \*\*kwargs)

define colors

snobject.lyman_bol(self[, interpolation, …])

calculate bolometric LC with Lyman bolometric correction

snobject.bb_colors(self, \*\*kwargs)

define epochs for BB !!! haven’t included any ebv value

snobject.bb_bol(self[, do_Kcorr, ab2vega])

calculate bolometric LC with diluted blackbody

snobject.match_colors(self, \*\*kwargs)

snobject.combine_multi_obs(self, \*\*kwargs)

snobject.clip_lc(self, \*\*kwargs)

Removes outlier data points using GP

snobject._nepochs(self, \*\*kwargs)

snobject._ncolors(self, \*\*kwargs)

snobject._peak_accuracy(self[, within])

snobject.summarize_plot(self[, ax])

snobject._ax(self[, to_t0, show_title, …])

snobject._ax1(self[, stype, show_title, …])

Spectra plot

snobject._ax2(self[, show_title, …])

snobject._ax3(self[, show_title, …])

snobject._ax4(self[, show_title, …])

snobject.show_corner(self, ax[, index, gp, …])

snobject.get_model(self[, engine, model, source])

snobject.savefig(self, \*\*kwargs)

snobject.showfig(self[, ax])

snobject.dm_error(self, filt)

snobject.clip_df

snobject.read_c10([filename])

snobject.mag_to_flux(mag[, magerr, limmag, …])

with flux/mag zerop

snobject.flux_to_mag(flux[, dflux, sigma, …])

Converts fluxes (erg/s/cm2/A) into AB magnitudes with flux/mag zerop

snobject.bin_df(df[, deltah, xkey, fkey])

snobject.merge_df_cols(_snobject__df)

will bug when combining columns from differents sources, i.e.

snobject.oac_phot_url(self, url)

(static) make url to query OAC

snobject.get_oac(self[, which])

parse local Open Astronomical Catalog data to self.lc

snobject.query_oac(self[, db, which])

query Open Astronomical Catalog data, via OACAPI, https://github.com/astrocatalogs/OACAPI
